name: You Are Not Alone (James Sonneveld)
description:
You find yourself alone in a mysterious house with no way out it seems. 

The further you go, the more you come to realise that maybe, you're not as alone as you might seem. 

This project was meant to be a part of the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2.

Unfortunately, I was not able to upload in time, mainly because I didn't read the times properly.

I'm pretty happy with what I got done within a week.

Feedback would be much appreciated. 

Note:

I used quite a few free sound and 3D model assets from the Unity Store. However, I did manage to make a few models of my own.

In the near future, I plan to release them as part of this project. I just need some time to organise them.

 Don't expect high quality models, they were only made in a week.
